briefdescription.para: IO_ClkInit() activates the port clocks of the used package.

detaileddescription.para: IO_ClkInit is automatically called in IO_Init(). The clocks of each port available at the used package is enabled.

simplesect.para: retVal (type: STD_RETURN_TYPE_e) returns E_OK when finished

briefdescription.para: Tests if the initialization of the io configuration was successful.

simplesect.para: retVal (type: STD_RETURN_TYPE_e) returns E_OK when the io-configuration on the hardware is the same as requested by the io-configuration module.

briefdescription.para: Initializes all ports and pins of the microcontroller.

detaileddescription.para:
The pins of the microcontroller package are initialized by calling IO_Init(). The pins are identified by a signal name given in io_cfg_foxbms_mcu0_generated.h. The function gets the configuration of the pins by the array *io_cfg, which is defined is done in io_cfg.c. The io_cfg array allows you to set the functionality of the pin in the following order of the IO_PIN_CFG_s struct:
pin
signal name
mode -input
output
push-pull
open drain
analog
interrupt
rising edge
falling edge
rising falling edge
event
rising edge
falling edge
rising falling edge
logic level
no pull
pull up
pull down
speed
low
medium
fast
high
alternate functions
RTC_50Hz
MCO
TAMPER
SWJ (SWD and JTAG)
TRACE
TIM
I2C
SPI
I2S
SAI
USART
UART
CAN
LCD-TFT
OTG
pin configuration locking
disable
enable
default value of the pin
reset/low
set/high
If the define IO_PIN_LOCKING is set in file io_cfg.h the pin configuration locking is performed as defined in file io_cfg.c at the array IO_PIN_CFG_s io_cfg.
The default value of the pin/signal is optional. If the not given the signal is set low.

briefdescription.para: Returns the state of a pin.

detaileddescription.para: Reads the state/output of the given pin, which is given by its symbolic name.

simplesect.para:
currentPinState (type: IO_PIN_STATE_e) returns
currentPinState
physical pin out
GPIO_PIN_SET
high
GPIO_PIN_RESET
low

briefdescription.para: Sets the state of a pin.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the state/output of the given pin, which is given by its symbolic name.

parameterdescription.para: (type: IO_PORTS_e) requested pin to be set

(type: IO_PIN_STATE_e) requests
requestedPinState
physical pin out
GPIO_PIN_SET
high
GPIO_PIN_RESET
low

briefdescription.para: Toggles the state of a pin.
Calls the EXTI_IRQHandler of the given pin.
Calls the EXTI_Callback of the given pin.
